Articles.Content:
Hi, this is how I like to see the Tracking Center internal (a new menu)

You can see buttons to the classic tracking center view but also missions button to select a specific mission as I've heard on future plans for the game.

There is also a Replay button to go in a menu from where you can watch your previous flights from liftoff to final landing, I think can be an interesting feature even to share your success and failures.

In the replay section I was wondering if our kerbalnouts can have an additional stuff to document their trips to other planets for example a camera or a videocamera to make some short movie and transmit/store back to the base. This can add some science value or budget (another future planned feature) selling some photos or movie filmed on the Mun.

Bye!

Hi, nice Tracking Center internals and functionalities. Don't know if and when Squad may create something similar in game, but have you checked ProbeControlRoom mod (WIP)? That mod seems to have much in common with what you would like to see (and, you may actually help with that mod to include other functionalities you like).

P.S.: Italy you from? Don't forget to come visit the italian thread on KSPF!

Hi, I know that mod, and it's great! But my idea is a simple and not interactive live screens, it's just a graphic to give a little more immersion, probably more similar to vehicles assembly hangars background where you can see a lot of busy kerbals do something! Not a real function but just a menu to separate sections I've mentioned. Funcionalities so complex as live screens I leave at great mods like RasterPropMonitor and of course ProbeControlRoom!

I'll watch for italian forum of course, thank you!!
